title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
object.size(x=lapply(ls(), get))
print(object.size(x=lapply(ls(), get)), units="Mb")
```

```{r}
for (itm in ls()) { 
    print(formatC(c(itm, object.size(get(itm))), 
        format="d", 
        big.mark=",", 
        width=30), 
        quote=F)
}
```
